review: We LOVE the Fire TV Stick.  I will admit, we are an Apple family.  We have 3 (yes, 3!) Apple TVs.  Initially, we bought the Fire TV Stick because CBS shows (The Good Wife, etc) were included through Prime, something that Apple TV does not have (unless purchasing through iTunes).  But, we have discovered the functionality is much greater than Apple TV.  The remote signal is much better, the graphics and navigation are better; all around, might I say, better!
author: Liz Chandler

review: Love the Fire TV stick!  I have other devices for gaming so I really don't need that portion or the full FireTV, but the stick is great, much easier than AppleTV and blows away ChromeCast.  This thing is great!
